title: Brothers Conflict - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Game   Adapted to Visual Novel   Female Protagonist   Love Triangles   Reverse Harem   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Twins   Wishes
author: Kanase Atsuko   Udajo
description: After her dad re-married, Ema moved into the Asahina Family House and acquired 13 brothers. Ema intended to live peacefully with them as a family, but the sudden appearance of a girl in an all male household causes discord. Going on with their lives, the brother's feelings for Ema change and the start of a same roof forbidden romance begins.>
